DOC.brief_summary: This study crush- culotte stenting bifurcation lesion use drug elute stent . This randomized Nordic multicenter study include 400 patient angina pectoris clinical angiographic follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Nordic Bifurcation Stent Technique Study ( BIF II )
DOC.detailed_description: Design : - Randomized open multicentre trial . Patients : - Number 400 . Randomization : - Treatment strategy culotte technique T-crush stenting Primary end-point : - Combined end point : cardiac death , myocardial infarction , stent thrombosis TVR 6 month . Secondary end point - Clinical - MACE ( cardiac death , MI , stent thrombosis TVR ) hospital period , 1 8 month . - Cardiac death hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - Myocardial infarction hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - Stent thrombosis hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - TVR hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - Total death hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - TLR hospital period , 1 , 6 8 month . - Myocardial infarction relate index procedure . - CCS-angina score 6 8 month . - Angiographic - Late loss main vessel side branch 8 month . - Percentual diameter stenosis main vessel side branch 8 month . - Angiographic restenosis ( > 50 % diameter stenosis ) rate main vessel side branch 8 month . End point evaluation : - Primary secondary end point assess independent end point committee . - The end point committee consist experience interventional cardiologist . - End point definition : - Q wave myocardial infarction . Appearance new Q wave two contiguous lead ECG . - Non Q wave myocardial infarction . Infarction , consider present patient clinical , angiographic , electrocardiographic , and/or laboratory evidence myocardial necrosis ECG show new Q wave . - Procedure relate myocardial infarction . A > threefold increase CK-MB/or Troponin-T/I . - Target lesion revascularization . Coronary by-pass operation graft PCI index lesion . - Target vessel revascularization . Coronary by-pass operation graft PCI index vessel . - Stent thrombosis . Thrombotic occlusion index stent/stents . - Vessel measurement . Proximal reference diameter : Vessel diameter proximal lesion . Distal reference diameter : Vessel diameter distal lesion . Reference diameter : Mean proximal distal vessel diameter . Percentual diameter stenosis : ( Reference diameter - minimal luminal diameter ) /reference diameter percent . - Angiographic restenosis . > 50 % diameter stenosis . Angiographic core lab : - The index follow-up angiogram assess blindly QCA core lab Department Cardiology , Skejby Hospital , 8200 Aarhus N , Denmark . Definition index angiography - The angiography obtain PCI procedure use index angiography . - Follow-up angiography . After 8 month , conventional diagnostic angiography perform projection use index angiography repeat . Steering committee - The steer committee member select basis participation study , see . All steer committee member full access database participate interpretation data . Progress study - The progress study check weekly basis steer committee . They receive evaluate data inclusion rate primary end point event rate . Further , steer committee receive evaluate weekly safety data rate stent thrombosis three group . Statistics Data Management - The statistical analysis perform UNI-C , University Aarhus . - Primary end point . The composite primary end point six month follow-up analyzed Kaplan-Meier method . Differences event-free survival curve three group compare use Wilcoxon log-rank test . - Two-sided test use , p-value consider indicate significance 0.05 . - Secondary end point parameter : For continuous variable , difference treatment group evaluate analysis variance Wilcoxon 's rank-sum test . For discrete variable , difference express count , percentage analyze Fisher 's exact test . Secondary end-points assess 8 month . - Two-sided test use , p-value consider indicate significance 0.05 . Safety - For safety reason , stent thrombosis one month monitor continuously . A stent thrombosis rate > 5 % treatment group necessitate premature termination trial . Analysis Population - Results analyze accord intention-to-treat principle i.e . patient randomize certain group follow assessed irrespectively actual treatment . Protocol violation note responsible center notify . Sample size calculation - 200 patient include group , total 400 patient study . This base following : We expect MACE rate 25 % control group 13 % interventional group . With alfa 5 % strength 80 % , 167 patient need group ( two-sided chi square test ) demonstrate difference . By include 200 patient group , possible dropout follow-up count . Randomization procedure - The patient randomize insertion stent . Both main vessel side branch may wire predilated randomization . - There block randomization accord country , stratification accord sex , age > 70 year , diabetes , use GPIIb/IIIa blocker +/- angiographic follow . - The patient computer randomize 24 hour telephone service . The PARAVOX system use . Monitoring study - Data monitor accord GCP rule independent professional . During trial , monitor regular contact trial site ( ) , include visit ensure trial conduct document properly compliance protocol , GCP applicable regulatory requirement . Publication - Results publish international cardiovascular journal . Publication author issue decide steer committee basis general involvement study ( core lab . function , end point committee membership etc . ) number include patient .
DOC.criteria: Stable unstable AP . Bifurcation lesion `` LAD/diagonal '' , `` Cx/obtuse marginal '' , `` RCAPDA/posterolateral branch '' `` LM/Cx/LAD '' . Diameter main vessel visual estimate > 3.0 mm . Diameter side branch visual estimate > 2.5 mm . Signed informed consent STelevation AMI within 24 hour . Expected survival < 1 year . Screatinine > 200 Umol/l . Allergy aspirin , clopidogrel ticlopidine . Allergy sirolimus . Left main bifurcation nonright dominant system .
